item.title: Pull Images From Your Harbor Registry With Kubernetes
item.description: Pulling images from a private registry with kubernetes In this example I am going to use Harbor. For the sake of best practices and security we first have to create a robot account on harbor : Then select the harbor repo on which the robot account will have these permissions : You then have a confirmation message from harbor, keep the secret : we will register it into a kubernetes secret in our cluster.
